definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: make smooth, bare, bald; scour, polish (NH id.; pull out, off (feathers, hair); Aram. mrat.. [[מְרַט]] id.; Ar. marit.a have little hair, marat. pluck out hair);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 S. [[וׇאֶמְרְטָה]] Ezr 9:3, sf. 3 mpl. [[וׇאֶמְרְטֵם]] Ne 13:25; Inf. cstr. [[מָרְטָה]] Ez Eze 21:16; Pt. pl. [[מׂרְטִים]] Is 50:6; pass. f. [[מְרוּטָה]] Ez Eze 21:14 + 2 t.;—

make bare [[כָּל־כָּתֵף מְרוּטָה]] Ez Eze 29:18 every shoulder is laid bare (fr. chafing of burden ; ‖[[כָּל־ראׁשׁ מֻקְרָח]]); the cheek (by plucking out beard) [[גֵּוִי נׇתַתִּי]] [[לְמַכִּים וּלְחָיַי לְמׂרְטִָים]] Is 50:6; c. acc. pers. [[וׇאֶמְרְטֵָם]] Ne 13:25 (both acts of violence); of hair and beard [[וׇאֶמְרְטָה מִשְּׂעַר ראׁשִׁי וּזֶקָנִי]] Ezr 9:3 (sign of grief).
scour, polish, a sword, only Ez Eze 21:14 (+ [[הוּחַדָּת]]; Co rds. ´[[מ]] as Pu), v:Eze 21:16 (del. Co), v:Eze 21:28, + v:Eze 21:20 [[מְרֻטָה]] for MT [[מְעֻטָּה]] (Ew Sm Co Berthol).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִמָּרֵט ראׁשׁוֹ]] Le 13:40, Le 13:41 his head is made bald (by leprosy).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[מׂרָָטָה]] Ez Eze 21:15, Eze 21:16; Pt. [[מְמׂרָט]] 1Ki 7:45, [[מוֹרָט]] Is 18:27 (Ges:§ 52 R.6):—scoured, polished, of bronze utensils of temple 1Ki 7:45; of human skin Is 18:27; of sword Ez Eze 21:15, Eze 21:16 (both + [[הוּחַדָּה]], v.
